resources.string:
CPU tuner does not have root access!
All CPU tuning related features will not work.
Did root your device?
Did you grant CPU tuner root access?
Found some issues... Some features might not work.
work but cannot set frequency.\nThis still yields quite good results.

Some governors are mostly working.
The not working governors are most likely due to the kernel/ROM. You have three possibilities:
1) Use the working governors and ignore the other. This will probably still yield nice results.
2) Flash a new kernel
3) Flash a new ROM
Please do not write e-mails unless you think there is something wrong with the check or the app.
Code for multicore CPU is used regardless what CPU is detected. (Beta feature)
Code for multicore CPU is only used if a mulitcore CPU is detected. (Beta feature)
Choose if tuning should be applied to all cores
License of the used gnome icon. Thanks for the nice icons.
Do you want to stop CPU tuner?
